plurals.name: choose_number_subtitle
plurals.item: %1$d numbers have been added to this device, but only 1 can be used at a time
%1$d number has been added to this device, but only 1 can be used at a time

plurals.name: download_sub_multi_carriers_text
plurals.item: "We're getting %2$d numbers from %1$s and %3$d other operators. This can take some time."
"We're getting %2$d numbers from %1$s and 1 other operator. This can take some time."

plurals.name: download_sub_text
plurals.item: "We're getting %2$d numbers from %1$s. This can take some time."
"We're getting your number from %1$s. This can take some time."

plurals.item: Adding your numbers…
Adding your number…

plurals.name: error_screen_title
plurals.item: Networks not activated
%1$s not activated

plurals.name: insufficient_memory_subtitle
plurals.item: "%d new numbers are ready to add to your phone. In order to see them, you'll need to delete one of your current numbers."
"%d new number is ready to add to your phone. In order to see it, you'll need to delete one of your current numbers."

plurals.name: insufficient_space_description_q
plurals.item: To use your numbers, you’ll first need to free up space by deleting existing numbers from this device. You can do this later in Settings.
To use your number, you’ll first need to free up space by deleting existing numbers from this device. You can do this later in Settings.

plurals.item: Something went wrong while trying to activate your numbers. Please contact %1$s for help at %2$s.
Something went wrong while trying to activate your number. Please contact %1$s for help at %2$s.

"Unfortunately, we couldn't add your numbers from %1$s and %2$d other operator."

"Unfortunately, we couldn't add 1 number from your operator."

"Unfortunately, we couldn't add %2$d number from %1$s."

"There wasn't enough space to add your numbers from %1$s and %2$d other operator."
